text: Hi, Stu here. I've been following Ember for a while but not using it. I'm going to start using it soon so I'm starting to immerse myself. I'm hoping to make it to the meet up on the 15th.

Hey, completely missed the introductions channel when I joined! I recently joined Ghost as their Ember.js developer but I’ve been using Ember since the early 1.0.0-pre days. I’ve not made it to a meetup yet but Ill hopefully be able to make it there more often in the future.
Awesomeness....Welcome. Be sure to come and say hi at the next one.
